column4: ZykoticK9, wicd used work well with the rt2870 ralink chip on jaunty , the upgrade to karmic appeared to kill any ability for the driver to connect. I've tried every tutorial I could find with no results. I'll be very happy if you guys can find a way to get the adapter work.
given the fact that i'm a complete newbie, chances are small that i'm going to find the solution all by myself
have you got any idea of another network manager i could use?
it might work with your router.I suspect my problem is with configuring my router to work with the wifi adapter
did you set up wicd with encryption ?
how do I set Wicd up with encryption?
actually you set your router to encrypt your wifi signal with a password and wep or wpa or wpa2 encryption , then you set the wicd network manager to match
problem is that I cant see my network in wicd
set up the encryption in windows, but I suspect your wifi broadcast on the router is turned off
No it isnt because i can still connect with  a laptop running vista
whwt encryption are you using in windows?
then do the same with wicd
I did that already, but he just keeps asking the password, which surely is correct
there is an alternative that can be used with wicd or any network manager ,it's called ndiswrapper.
yes I heard of that, but isnt that to install drivers for your wireless card?
